== Kallur Thekkummuri (CT) (627940) ==

Kallur Thekkummuri (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 12.5 sq. km. and harbouring 4466 households with total population of 17480 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 332 km. Male population is 8401 and female population is 9079. Scheduled Caste population is 1521 and Scheduled Tribes population is 17. Census Location Code of the town is 627940<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Koratty at a distance of 5 km.
